TITLE: Episode 27 - Badass: A Conversation with John McAfee
DESCRIPTION: We have a special treat for you in the form of an extra episode this week. We had a conversation with John McAfee. John is a cyber security expert, past and future presidential candidate, pirate on the high seas, and overall badass. We talked Epstein, technology, violence, the deep state, and how he was framed for murder. It was a great conversation that I am beyond stoked to share with you.
